subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In New York, Leon Washington may be hard to pick out from the other runners in the Jets’ revolving backfield, but where he grew up in Jacksonville, Fla., he is worshiped as a patron saint of success.
snippet: In New York, Leon Washington may be hard to pick out from the other runners in the Jets’ revolving backfield, but where he grew up in Jacksonville, Fla., he is worshiped as a patron saint of success.
